name: Lemon Bars
author: Donna Menz
instructions: Sift together 2 cups of flour and powdered sugar. Cut in butter or oleo until mixture clings. Press into a 13 x 9 inch pan and bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes or until brown. Cool. Beat together eggs, sugar and lemon juice. Sift together the 1/4 cup of flour and baking powdered, stir into egg mixture. Pour over oven baked crust. Bake at 350° for 25 minutes. Sprinkle with additional powdered sugar, cool and cut into bars.
